Articles.Content:
I have a space station with a number of fuel tanks and I'm finding it painful to select each tank to fill/empty when need to transfer fuel to or from passing ships.

I'm just wondering if there is a mod that allows all tanks on a space station to be treated as 1 so that when a ship is docked I can just transfer fuel to or from the station without having to worry about which tank I am putting fuel into or taking it out of.
I use this mod and it works well for me. Not exactly what you are looking for but might be worth to take a look.
Thanks, I'll take a look at it.
